promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young simple ladybug grass-type with a green runic crystal core. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or grass. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Verdruna, a chibi young simple ladybug grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: absorb, double-edge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word ladybug or grass or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, ladybug-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald galaxy background
generatedDescription: Verdruna loves basking in the sun, playing in the forests, and dancing to the night winds. Its absorbing abilities give it a mind all its own.
